title: Getting Gud
body:
ive been playing for about a year now, and in that time ive learned quite a bit but i still have alot to improve on. what i would like to know is what obvious things do you do now that didnt even occur to you when you started playing, and how much did that improve your play style?

for me, it was that even if im not at full health, i dont need to use heal.

replies.body: You also should've made the title 'Gitting gud'
Assert dominance over your teammates as a support.
i dont think ive ever seen a support do that

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qLAuw9yO,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-10-13T00:54:56.186+0000)
>
> i dont think ive ever seen a support do that

Well you've never played with me. I'm not mean, but I make it clear that I'm in charge of shotcalling.

Jungle? {{item:3364}} You don't really need wards late game, us pinks more.

I started to do this and it's like permanent safety on your buffs and or a camera on your jungler.
